title: Google\Cloud\BigQuery\Migration\V2\MigrationTask
name: MigrationTask
description:
A single task for a migration which has details about the configuration of the task.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.bigquery.migration.v2.MigrationTask

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.id
params.description: Output only. Immutable. The unique identifier for the migration task. The ID is server-generated.

params.name: data.type
params.description: The type of the task. This must be one of the supported task types: Translation_Teradata2BQ, Translation_Redshift2BQ, Translation_Bteq2BQ, Translation_Oracle2BQ, Translation_HiveQL2BQ, Translation_SparkSQL2BQ, Translation_Snowflake2BQ, Translation_Netezza2BQ, Translation_AzureSynapse2BQ, Translation_Vertica2BQ, Translation_SQLServer2BQ, Translation_Presto2BQ, Translation_MySQL2BQ.

params.name: data.state
params.description: Output only. The current state of the task.

params.name: data.processing_error
params.description: Output only. An explanation that may be populated when the task is in FAILED state.

params.name: data.last_update_time
params.description: Time when the task was last updated.
